verses.name: Job 35:7
verses.text: If thou be righteous, what givest thou him? or what receiveth he of thine hand?

verses.name: Job 35:8
verses.text: Thy wickedness may hurt a man as thou art; and thy righteousness may profit the son of man.

verses.name: Job 35:9
verses.text: By reason of the multitude of oppressions they make the oppressed to cry: they cry out by reason of the arm of the mighty.

verses.name: Job 35:10
verses.text: But none saith, Where is God my maker, who giveth songs in the night;

verses.name: Job 35:11
verses.text: Who teacheth us more than the beasts of the earth, and maketh us wiser than the fowls of heaven?
